TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit X509CertificateStoreTokenResolver extends System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver

Docs.summary: Represents a token resolver that can resolve tokens of type against a specified X.509 certificate store.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a default X.509 certificate store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The default store location is <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation.LocalMachine>. The default store name is <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName.My>.

Docs.param: One of the enumeration values that specify the name of the X.509 certificate store.
One of the enumeration values that specify the location of the X.509 certificate store.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class that uses the X.509 certificate store with the specified location and name to resolve tokens.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override bool TryResolveSecurityKeyCore (System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause keyIdentifierClause, out System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey key);

Docs.param: The key identifier clause from which to resolve the security key.
When this method returns, contains the security key that was resolved from the key identifier clause. This parameter is treated as uninitialized.

Docs.returns: if the key identifier clause is successfully resolved; otherwise, .
